PageWidgetPortable.Title: Aprovação de pré-contrato
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>PORTAL_INT_APROVAR_PRECONTRATOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>true</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS = 2 AND ((((SELECT TIPO FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS WHERE HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO) = 2) AND ((SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'VISUALIZAR_APROVACAO_PRECONTRATO_FATURAMENTO') IN @TAREFAS)) OR (((SELECT TIPO FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS WHERE HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO) = 4) AND ((SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TAREFAS WHERE NOME = 'VISUALIZAR_APROVACAO_PRECONTRATO_PERMUTA') IN @TAREFAS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/PortalInterno/a/Contratos/Todos/VisualizarPreContratos.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
